{"__typename":"RiskHazardsWithMethod","methodDescription":"Standard Procedure for maintenance on anchor","hazards":[{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Brake band may drop while dismantling / assembling","existingMeasures":"1. Proper lashings on brake bands - prevent uncontrolled swinging motion.
2. Personnel to stand clear when lifting or removing.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Anchor not properly secured","existingMeasures":"1. Bow stopper
2. Windlass gearing engaged.
3. Cable heaved in all the way.
4. Excess lashing at strong points using wire of suitable diametre (verify SWL)
5. There should be no play at all in the anchor when in stowed position.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Failure of Lifting appliance in use - tripod, chain block, shackle, eye bolt, slings","existingMeasures":"1. Adequate SWL of all appliances.
2. Inspection of all appliances prior use - discard defective items.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":4,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":4,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Damage to hydraulic lines and other equipment in work area","existingMeasures":"1. Briefing of personnel prior work commencement.
2. Use leverage instead of hammer where possible.
3. Lines in vicinity to be dismantled if required to create space (prevent accidental damage)","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":2,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":2,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Personnel Injuries","existingMeasures":"1. Proper PPE.
2. Don't insert hands under heavy loads or in areas which are not readily accessible.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Slip and trip hazards","existingMeasures":"1. PPE
2. Area clear of obstructions and grease/oil stains cleaned.
","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":4,"consequence":2,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":3,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":2,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Miscommunication","existingMeasures":"Communication established between work area and navigating bridge, engine room.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Hydraulic Lines not isolated (Windlass power)","existingMeasures":"1. Lock out -Tag out in use.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Incorrect assembly and adjustment","existingMeasures":"1. Refer to maker's manual.
2. After assembly - try out the brake, also ensure when possible that cable is allowed to run out freely.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":4,"consequence":2,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":3,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":2,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Adverse effect of sea/weather on vessel movement","existingMeasures":"Prohibit job in bad weather","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":4,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":4,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Fatigue coupled with Time constraint","existingMeasures":"Ensure rest hours are complied and not to rush the job.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":2,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":2,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null}]}
